name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones

description: Track your health with heart rate monitoring, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant up to 50m.

name: iPhone 17 Pro
description: Experience the next level of performance with the iPhone 17 Pro in stunning Orange Titanium. Powered by the A19 Pro chip, featuring a 48MP ProCamera system with 5x optical zoom, Dynamic Island, and an always-on ProMotion display. 5G capable with up to 27 hours of video playback.
